name: Idle Metro
description:
Metro Idle Game is the most fun and addictive of all idle games! Get ready to earn money as you transport passengers with your metro lines and become the transportation king of the universe!

- Unlock handcrafted tunnels and character packs
- Earn money by carrying your passengers
- Collect your offline bonus when you come back!
- Swipe top screen to call more passengers to the station
- Tap the tunnels to call them from the station to your tunnels
